p: Dr. Greenland reports the following financial relationships, which are not related to this publication: Boehringer Ingelheim (Ridgefield, Connecticut), Theravance Biopharma (South San Francisco, California), Genentech (South San Francisco, California), Atara Biotherapeutics (South San Francisco, California), BioFire Diagnostics (Salt Lake City, Utah), Thermo Fisher (Waltham, Massachusetts). Dr. London reports ongoing financial relationships with Springer Verlag Current Anesthesiology Reports (Springer Nature Group, New York, New York), UpToDate (Wolters Kluwer, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania), and the American Society of Anesthesiologists (Schaumburg, Illinois). The other authors declare no competing interests.
